00002 #define BUNDLER_SETTINGS

00004 //-----------------Settings structs for the features stages---------------//
00005 
00006 //Settings for the feature detection.
00007 struct bundler_settings_sift
00008 {
00009     float keypoint_curve_ratio; //Used in bapl_keypoint_extractor.
00010     int sift_octave_size; //Used in bapl_dense_sift
00011     int sift_num_octaves; //Used in bapl_dense_sift
00012 
00013     bundler_settings_sift() :
00014         keypoint_curve_ratio(10.0f), sift_octave_size(6),
00015         sift_num_octaves(1) {}
00016 };
00017 
00018 //Settings for the propose stage. This stage doesn't actually use any
00019 // settings, but we've included it for completeness.
00020 typedef char bundler_settings_propose_matches_all;
00021 
00022 //Settings for the match stage. The single setting here is the maximum
00023 // allowable distance ratio for a match to be considered valid.
00024 struct bundler_settings_match_ann
00025 {
00026     double min_dists_ratio;
00027 
00028     bundler_settings_match_ann():
00029         min_dists_ratio(.6) { }
00030 };
00031 
00032 //Settings for the refine stage. The settings have to do with
00033 // RANSAC and the f-matrix estimation.
00034 struct bundler_settings_refine_epipolar
00035 {
00036     //The desired probability of getting a good f matrix
00037     double probability_good_f_mat;
00038 
00039     //The maximum distance between the generated point and the matched
00040     // point for the point to be considered an outlier.
00041     double outlier_threshold;
00042 
00043     //The maximum expected porportion of the outliers in the set. This, as
00044     // well as the desired probability, is used to get the number of
00045     // iterations to run.
00046     double max_outlier_frac;
00047 
00048     //The minimum number of inliers in order for two images to be matched.
00049     int min_inliers;
00050 
00051     bundler_settings_refine_epipolar():
00052         probability_good_f_mat(.95), outlier_threshold(9.0),
00053         max_outlier_frac(.5), min_inliers(16) { }
00054 };
00055 
00056 // Same deal as _settings_propose_match_all
00057 typedef char bundler_settings_chain_matches;
00058 
00059 struct bundler_settings_tracks
00060 {
00061     bundler_settings_sift detect_settings;
00062     bundler_settings_propose_matches_all propose_matches_settings;
00063     bundler_settings_match_ann match_settings;
00064     bundler_settings_refine_epipolar refine_settings;
00065     bundler_settings_chain_matches chain_matches_settings;
00066 };

00069 //----------------Settings structs for the sfm stages.-------------------//
00070 struct bundler_settings_create_initial_recon
00071 {
00072     //Settings for estimating homographies using RANSAC
00073     int min_number_of_matches_homography;
00074     int number_ransac_rounds_homography;
00075     double inlier_threshold_homography;
00076 
00077     //Pretty much the same settings for estimating essential matrices
00078     int number_ransac_rounds_e_matrix;
00079     double inlier_threshold_e_matrix;
00080 
00081     bundler_settings_create_initial_recon() :
00082         min_number_of_matches_homography(50),
00083         number_ransac_rounds_homography(128),
00084         inlier_threshold_homography(6.0),
00085         number_ransac_rounds_e_matrix(2048),
00086         inlier_threshold_e_matrix(4.0){ }
00087 };
00088 
00089 struct bundler_settings_select_next_images
00090 {
00091     //The minimum number of points already added that a camera must observe.
00092     // If no camera meets this description, the reconstruction is
00093     // considered complete.
00094     int min_number_observed_points;
00095 
00096     bundler_settings_select_next_images():
00097         min_number_observed_points(10) { }
00098 };
00099 
00100 struct bundler_settings_add_next_images
00101 {
00102     // The standard two ransac parameters for the
00103     // projection matrix estimation.
00104     int number_ransac_rounds;
00105 
00106     // The actual threshold is
00107     // inlier_size_multiplier * max(img width, img height)
00108     double inlier_size_multiplier;
00109 
00110     bundler_settings_add_next_images() :
00111         number_ransac_rounds(40960),
00112         inlier_size_multiplier(6.0){ }
00113 };
00114 
00115 struct bundler_settings_add_new_points
00116 {
00117     int min_observing_images;
00118     double min_ray_angle;
00119 
00120     bundler_settings_add_new_points() :
00121         min_observing_images(2),
00122         min_ray_angle(2.0) { }
00123 };
00124 
00125 struct bundler_settings_bundle_adjust
00126 {
00127     int number_of_iterations;
00128 
00129     bundler_settings_bundle_adjust():
00130         number_of_iterations(10000) { }
00131 };
00132 
00133 struct bundler_settings_sfm
00134 {
00135     bundler_settings_create_initial_recon initial_recon_settings;
00136     bundler_settings_select_next_images select_next_images_settings;
00137     bundler_settings_add_next_images add_next_images_settings;
00138     bundler_settings_add_new_points add_new_points_settings;
00139     bundler_settings_bundle_adjust bundle_adjust_settings;
00140 };

00147     bundler_settings_sfm sfm_settings;
